text: Novi ( ) is a city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan. As of the 2020 census, the population was 66,243. The city is located about northwest of the center of Detroit. It is about northeast of the center of Ann Arbor.Seeley, Thaddeus D. (Editor, 1912). "Chapter XXXVII: Novi and Waterford Townships". History Of Oakland County, Michigan V1: A Narrative Account Of Its Historical Progress, Its People, And Its Principal Interests. p. 482. Archived by the University of Michigan. ==References== Category:Cities in Michigan
title: Novi, Michigan
